data: Charles Veramont | Count de Charney | Napoleon
annals of modern science | mysterious archives of the police

Charles Veramont, Count de Charney, whose name is not wholly effaced from the annals of modern science, and may be found inscribed in the mysterious archives of the police under Napoleon, was endowed by nature with an uncommon capacity for study.
